string.text:
20-caliber solid lead slug designed to be shot by smoothbore weapons. Nicknamed the "Devastator" due to being really heavy and mean. 
 
%c[ui_gray_2] - %c[ui_gray_2] Armor penetration power: %c[ui_gray_1]BR2 (25)
%c[ui_gray_2] - %c[ui_gray_2] Flesh damage power: %c[ui_gray_1]Very high

20-caliber dart round designed specifially to punch through the most robust armor while also mantaining an affordable manufacturing and commercial price point. 
 
%c[ui_gray_2] - %c[ui_gray_2] Armor penetration power: %c[ui_gray_1]BR5 (50)
%c[ui_gray_2] - %c[ui_gray_2] Flesh damage power: %c[ui_gray_1]High - Very high
